data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Gotland, Sweden and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gotland, Sweden
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Gotland to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 3,287 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Gotland. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Yazidi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Yazidi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Yazidi people is yours.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Gotland, Sweden from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Gotland, Sweden.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Gotland, Sweden.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

location.name: Gotland
location.people_groups_list: Azerbaijani, Arab, Libyan, Tibetan, Bosniak, Moroccan, Arabic-speaking
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Azerbaijani (2,200), Arab, Libyan (2,100), Tibetan (1,000), Bosniak (32,000), Moroccan, Arabic-speaking (5,600)
